channel.title: Pi Commands
channel.description:
I need a command, that donator's can use only.
(::Tall) It make's you tall
(::Emote) It's not in my command file?
Also I need a command where when you do it, it likes put a phrase in the chatbox, but the phrase look's like when your examining a item or something where it's Black, so like ::server

item.title: Pi Commands
item.dc:creator: @Phalanx Phalanx
item.description:
@Phalanx wrote:

For tall, does anybody have the animation id that make’s you tall?

Read full topic

item.title: Pi Commands
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

c.sendMessage(“Text Here”);

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("Test")) {
c.sendMessage("The Text between these quotes will be shown as a 'phrase' like when your examining something");

Read full topic

item.title: Pi Commands
item.dc:creator: @RegalX RegalX
item.description:
@RegalX wrote:

For the chat one, use

if (playerCommandstartsWith("chatmessage")) { c.sendMessage("change this to what you want"); }

For the others I don’t know what you mean. If the tall command is there use

if (playerCommandstartsWith("tall") && c.isDonator == 1) { code here }

Read full topic
